title: Matchmakers and Mischief
description: The matchmaker isn't looking for love from her best friend--but it knocked her feet out from under her anyway.Emma Lee Bradford loves love. She's even made a business of helping people get married! Not that she's interested in getting married herself.George is used to Emma Lee's mischief, and the madness that follows. Normally he doesn't mind, but this time, there's more at stake. His heart, her credibility, and even her business could be lost, but she cannot be dissuaded.If Emma Lee isn't careful, she'll lose the heart of the man she never knew she needed.
author: Ellie Thornton
